copy.noSelection: Please make a selection before clicking on Submit.
copy.speedChatPlus: In order to confirm your chat preference, a verification has been sent to the e-mail address on record. Please follow the steps in the e-mail to complete your registration.
copy.generalError: There was an error processing your request. Please try again later.

copies.copy: Customize your Fairy avatar - Select from five Fairy talents and customize your Fairy's facial features, hair style, outfits and accessories
Team up with your Fairy friends - Tinker Bell, Silvermist, Iridessa, Rosetta, Fawn and Vidia - in six action-adventures

Connect to all the fun in PixieHollow.com - Download your Fairies from PixieHollow.com to the English Countryside on the Nintendo DS. Send postcards from Fairy Camp to friends in PixieHollow.com. Upload ingredients from the English Countryside to PixieHollow.com
Create new Fairy outfits - Select from over 260 clothing items and accessories
Compete in 30 mini-games - Explore the mainland in various quests, time-based minigames, puzzles and crafts
